predicate: The bwp-id from initialdownlinkbwp_pdsch-config must match the scramblingid from nzp-csi-rs-resourcetoaddmodlist
notes: The evidence explicitly states that the BWP-Id in CSI-ResourceConfig (which corresponds to field1) defines which bandwidth part the configured CSI-RS (which corresponds to field2) is located in, implying a match.

meta.evidence: - scramblingID defines scrambling ID of CSI-RS with length of 10 bits. - BWP-Id in CSI-ResourceConfig defines which bandwidth part the configured CSI-RS is located in.
